raw_body: Beloved wife of the late Samson Perera. Loving mother of Santha and Carmeline, Christine and the late Hamiltus Seneviratne, Lali and Ravinath Goonesekera, Samagi and Hirantha Perera, Polly and Bevan Ranasinghe. Cherished grandmother of Shahane and Nadee, Shalindra and Natasha, Hashane and Hasna, Roshaini and Chamara, Ranesha and Rakitha, Rehan, Himasha, Shanelle, Hashindra and Rushenka, Shana, Bimesh and Octavia, Shalon and Shiki. Great-grandmoth
